ProcedureOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: CATALOG=<libref.>catalog] 
      
Specifies the SAS catalog to process.

[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
      
Restricts processing of the current PROC CATALOG step to one entry type.
Forces statements to execute on a catalog that is opened by another resource environment.
Deletes all entries in a SAS catalog.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
Syntax: CHANGE old-name-1=new-name-1 <...old-name-n=new-name-n> </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;
      
Renames one or more catalog entries.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: CONTENTS <OUT=SAS-data-set> <FILE=fileref>;]
      
Lists the contents of a catalog in the procedure output or writes a list of the contents to a 
SAS data set, an external file, or both.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: CATALOG=<libref.>catalog] 
          
Specifies the SAS catalog to process.

[Syntax: FILE=fileref] 
          
Sends the contents to an external file, identified with a SAS fileref.

[Syntax: OUT=SAS-data-set] 
          
Sends the contents to a SAS data set.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: COPY OUT=<libref.>catalog <options>;]
      
Copies some or all of the entries in one catalog to another catalog.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: OUT=<libref.>catalog] 
          
Names the catalog to which entries are copied.

[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type for the current COPY statement and any 
subsequent SELECT or EXCLUDE statements.

[Syntax: IN=<libref.>catalog] 
          
Specifies the catalog to copy.

Specifies whether to enable more than one user to copy to the same catalog at the 
same time.

StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip1: Locks the entire catalog to one user.
StatementOptionToolTips.@ToolTip2: Enables more than one user to copy to the same catalog at the same time.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata: Deletes the original catalog or entries after the new copy is made.

Prevents the copied version of the following SAS/AF entry types from being edited 
by the BUILD procedure: 

CBT PROGRAM FRAME SCL HELP SYSTEM MENU
Omits copying the source lines when you copy a SAS/AF PROGRAM, FRAME, or SCL entry.
Overwrites the destination (specified by OUT=) if it already exists.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: DELETE entry-1 <...entry-n> </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;] 
      
Deletes entries from a SAS catalog.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: EXCHANGE name-1=other-name-1 <...name-n=other-name-n> </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>; ]
      
Switches the name of two catalog entries.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: EXCLUDE entry-1 <...entry-n> </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;]
      
Specifies entries that the COPY statement does not copy.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: SAVE entry-1 <...entry-n> </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;]
      
Specify entries not to delete from a SAS catalog.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: SELECT entry-1 <...entry-n. </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;]
      
Specifies entries that the COPY statement copies.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.

StatementHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: MODIFY entry (DESCRIPTION=<<'>entry-description<'>>) </ ENTRYTYPE=etype>;]
      
Changes the description of a catalog entry.

StatementOptionHelp.#cdata:
[Syntax: DESCRIPTION=<<'>entry-description<'>>]
          
Changes the description of a catalog entry by replacing it with a new description, up to 256 characters 
long, or by removing it altogether. You can enclose the description in single or double quotes.

[Syntax: ENTRYTYPE=etype] 
          
Restricts processing to one entry type.
